channel.title: [REQ] HEY! I need help with my website! [PLEASE READ!]
channel.description:
EXPLANATION: Okay! So I got loads of screen shots from RuneScapes Website and Edited it all in PhotoShop so what I did then was Made some HTML coding for it all and managed to get it all layed out rite everything is in the correct place and I edited its writing and everything to my servers name and information about my server...
What I need help with! I need help hosting it you see Ive got the Index.Html and Page2.Html and all the Images in a file what I need now is for someone to help put it onto a webhost to put it online!! If you can help PM me Msn: GabrielPereira190@live.co.uk - Eclipsedz!

go to 000webhost then sign up
up to 5 accounts
100gb bandwith a month i think.
just go to file uploader and upload your jar and client.html

item.title: [REQ] HEY! I need help with my website! [PLEASE READ!]
item.dc:creator: @lotto320 lotto320
item.description:
@lotto320 wrote:

Get a host like 50Gigs at 50gigs.net =) Best stuff for free
mySQL, FTP, Almost latest Php and more… for FREE
I think its up to 50 mySQL databases, 50 subdomains (example.50gigs.net) or you can park a domain than you can have (example.something.com) and in that case ‘‘something.com’’ is your chooize!

item.title: [REQ] HEY! I need help with my website! [PLEASE READ!]
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“Eclipsedz, post:1, topic:378317”]EXPLANATION:
Okay! So I got loads of screen shots from RuneScapes Website and Edited it all in PhotoShop so what I did then was
Made some HTML coding for it all and managed to get it all layed out rite
everything is in the correct place and I edited its writing and everything to my servers name and information
about my server…

What I need help with!
I need help hosting it you see Ive got the Index.Html and Page2.Html and all the Images in a file
what I need now is for someone to help put it onto a webhost to put it online!!
If you can help PM me
Msn: GabrielPereira190@live.co.uk

  • Eclipsedz![/quote]
    you should have something like this:
./website/index.php
./website/page.php
./website/images/image.jpg

All you need to do now is find a free webhost, but you’d be better off just paying for a premium one, getting it all. There’s millions:

Free:

x10hosting
000webhost
heliohost
hosthelpers

Payed:

Godaddy
Hostgator
A VPS or dedicated server

and you should use putty*, or filezilla, so you can transfer your files onto your webhost directory

you can even download apache or lighttpd, and do your shit from there.

Read full topic
